lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about Geoff Ogilvy’s victory at the Accenture Match Play Championship in Arizona referred incorrectly to a shot he hit on the 11th hole that landed under a jumping cholla cactus. It was his second shot, not his drive.
snippet: An article on Monday about Geoff Ogilvy’s victory at the Accenture Match Play Championship in Arizona referred incorrectly to a shot he hit on the 11th hole that landed under a jumping cholla cactus. It was his second shot, not his drive.
